svg:

Angular ApplicationModules (NgModules)- A Logical grouping of related angular thingies*- "sort of" like a DLL or Class library in .NET- The Thingies are: - Components - Services - Directives - Route Guards - Pipes - etc.- There is a "root level" module (app.module.ts) that "bootstraps" our application."AppModule" - the root level module - and a single "parent" component app.component.ts
